title: How are Osiris and Anubis related? - Quora

response.answer_text: In ancient Egyptian myth, the dog-faced god Anubis was the illegitimate son of the god Osiris. In the story, the goddess Nepthis desired Osiris, and secretly lay with him. The child Anubis was born from this union. The goddess Isis, wife and sister to Osiris sent for the child and raised Anubis as her own child. In ancient Egyptian astronomy, dog-faced Anubis was part of constellation Canis Major, the Great Dog. Sirius, the brightest star in the sky, is part of this constellation and is called ‘the dog star’. In ancient Egyptian astronomy, the god Osiris was constellation Orion the Hunter.

Osiris God of death, afterlife, life and resurrection Son of Net and Geb, husband och Isis, father of Horus and Anubis, and brother of Seth Anubis God of dead, embalming, funeral and mourning ceremonies Son of Nephtys and Osiris Consort of Bastet and Anput
